distributor.header: Distributor of Building Materials and Civil Works
distributor.content: Building material distributor company located in Surabaya, Indonesia

about_us.content: PT. Citra Prisma Mandiri is formed to service specific requirements of all buildings, especially on concrete technologies, sealants, waterproofing, gypsum, GRC panels and stone wool insulation. With support and transfer technology from reputable international companies like Wacker, Bostik, Grace (GCP), Conwood, Knauf, Boral, Yoshino, Hunter Douglas, etc.

content.content1: Used to protect concrete structures from being penetrated by water causing further concrete deterioration and leakages.
content.content2: Used to repair active water leakages in concretes (tunnels, basements roof decks, bathroom x pool decks)
list2: Leakages on : Basement, Bathroom, Balcony, Roof Deck, Pool
content.content3: Used to restore the integrity of cracked and honeycombed concrete structures
list3: DRY : Roof deck / Retaining wall / Basement Floor
DRY & WET : Roof deck / Retaining wall / Basement Floor

content.content1: Used to beautify ceiling in outdoor/public areas such as airport lounges, bus and train station and special areas like kitchens and pool decks, also available for facades of commercial buildings and bridges etc.
Used to band two massive structures and prevents leakage through the joins
list1: Aluminium to Aluminium / Aluminium to glass joints / ACP Joints
